name: when setting quality option to 0
message: should be produce output at min quality

name: when setting quality option to 50
message: should be produce output at half quality

name: when setting quality option to 100
message: should be produce output at max quality

name: when setting quality option to -1
error: Value for quality option out of range. Use value between 0-100 (inclusive)

name: when setting quality option to 101
error: Value for quality option out of range. Use value between 0-100 (inclusive)
